label: A2B_hP9_152_c_a-001
title: $\alpha$-Quartz (low Quartz) Structure
comments: When $x_{1}=1/2$, $y_{2}=2x_{2}$, and $z_{2}=1/2$ this tranforms into the \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_hP9_180_i_d-001}{high $\beta$-quartz ($C8$)} structure. This structure can also be found in the enantiomorphic space group $P3_{2}21$ \#154.
